00208 typedef union
00209 {
00210   S16 s16   ;
00211   U16 u16   ;
00212   S8  s8 [2];
00213   U8  u8 [2];
00214 } Union16;
00215 
00217 typedef union
00218 {
00219   S32 s32   ;
00220   U32 u32   ;
00221   S16 s16[2];
00222   U16 u16[2];
00223   S8  s8 [4];
00224   U8  u8 [4];
00225 } Union32;
00226 
00228 typedef union
00229 {
00230   S64 s64   ;
00231   U64 u64   ;
00232   S32 s32[2];
00233   U32 u32[2];
00234   S16 s16[4];
00235   U16 u16[4];
00236   S8  s8 [8];
00237   U8  u8 [8];
00238 } Union64;

00242 {
00243   S64 *s64ptr;
00244   U64 *u64ptr;
00245   S32 *s32ptr;
00246   U32 *u32ptr;
00247   S16 *s16ptr;
00248   U16 *u16ptr;
00249   S8  *s8ptr ;
00250   U8  *u8ptr ;
00251 } UnionPtr;

00255 {

00257   volatile U64 *u64ptr;

00261   volatile U16 *u16ptr;

00263   volatile U8  *u8ptr ;
00264 } UnionVPtr;

00427 #define Rd_bits( value, mask)        ((value) & (mask))
00428 
00437 #define Wr_bits(lvalue, mask, bits)  ((lvalue) = ((lvalue) & ~(mask)) |\
00438                                                  ((bits  ) &  (mask)))
00439 
00447 #define Tst_bits( value, mask)  (Rd_bits(value, mask) != 0)
00448 
00456 #define Clr_bits(lvalue, mask)  ((lvalue) &= ~(mask))
00457 
00465 #define Set_bits(lvalue, mask)  ((lvalue) |=  (mask))
00466 
00474 #define Tgl_bits(lvalue, mask)  ((lvalue) ^=  (mask))
00475 
00483 #define Rd_bitfield( value, mask)           (Rd_bits( value, mask) >> ctz(mask))
00484 
00493 #define Wr_bitfield(lvalue, mask, bitfield) (Wr_bits(lvalue, mask, (U32)(bitfield) << ctz(mask)))
00494

00508 # define cpu_relax()             __asm__ __volatile__("sub pc, pc, -4" ::: "memory", "cc")
00509 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00510 # define cpu_relax()             __asm__ __volatile__("sub pc, pc, -4")

00551 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00552   #define clz(u)              __builtin_clz(u)
00553 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00554   #if (__VER__ == 330) && (__SUBVERSION__ <= 1)
00555     // __count_leading_zeros is broken and returns a value which is offset by
00556     // -32 when called with a constant parameter.
00557     #define clz(v) (0 == v ? 32 : (31 & __count_leading_zeros(v)))
00558   #else
00559     #define clz(v) __count_leading_zeros(v)
00560   #endif
00561 #endif
00562 
00569 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00570   #define ctz(u)              __builtin_ctz(u)
00571 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00572   #define ctz(u)              __count_trailing_zeros(u)
00573 #endif

00576 
00579 
00585 int_fast8_t ilog2_undefined(void);
00586 
00594 static inline int_fast8_t ilog2(uint32_t x)
00595 {
00596     if (is_constant(x))
00597         return ((x) & (1ULL << 31) ? 31 :
00598             (x) & (1ULL << 30) ? 30 :
00599             (x) & (1ULL << 29) ? 29 :
00600             (x) & (1ULL << 28) ? 28 :
00601             (x) & (1ULL << 27) ? 27 :
00602             (x) & (1ULL << 26) ? 26 :
00603             (x) & (1ULL << 25) ? 25 :
00604             (x) & (1ULL << 24) ? 24 :
00605             (x) & (1ULL << 23) ? 23 :
00606             (x) & (1ULL << 22) ? 22 :
00607             (x) & (1ULL << 21) ? 21 :
00608             (x) & (1ULL << 20) ? 20 :
00609             (x) & (1ULL << 19) ? 19 :
00610             (x) & (1ULL << 18) ? 18 :
00611             (x) & (1ULL << 17) ? 17 :
00612             (x) & (1ULL << 16) ? 16 :
00613             (x) & (1ULL << 15) ? 15 :
00614             (x) & (1ULL << 14) ? 14 :
00615             (x) & (1ULL << 13) ? 13 :
00616             (x) & (1ULL << 12) ? 12 :
00617             (x) & (1ULL << 11) ? 11 :
00618             (x) & (1ULL << 10) ? 10 :
00619             (x) & (1ULL <<  9) ?  9 :
00620             (x) & (1ULL <<  8) ?  8 :
00621             (x) & (1ULL <<  7) ?  7 :
00622             (x) & (1ULL <<  6) ?  6 :
00623             (x) & (1ULL <<  5) ?  5 :
00624             (x) & (1ULL <<  4) ?  4 :
00625             (x) & (1ULL <<  3) ?  3 :
00626             (x) & (1ULL <<  2) ?  2 :
00627             (x) & (1ULL <<  1) ?  1 :
00628             (x) & (1ULL <<  0) ?  0 :
00629             ilog2_undefined());
00630 
00631     return 31 - clz(x);
00632 }

00646 #define bit_reverse8(u8)    ((U8)(bit_reverse32((U8)(u8)) >> 24))
00647 
00654 #define bit_reverse16(u16)  ((U16)(bit_reverse32((U16)(u16)) >> 16))
00655 
00662 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00663   #define bit_reverse32(u32) \
00664   (\
00665     {\
00666       unsigned int __value = (U32)(u32);\
00667       __asm__ ("brev\t%0" : "+r" (__value) :  : "cc");\
00668       (U32)__value;\
00669     }\
00670   )
00671 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00672   #define bit_reverse32(u32)  ((U32)__bit_reverse((U32)(u32)))
00673 #endif
00674 
00681 #define bit_reverse64(u64)  ((U64)(((U64)bit_reverse32((U64)(u64) >> 32)) |\
00682                                    ((U64)bit_reverse32((U64)(u64)) << 32)))

00698 #define Test_align(val, n     ) (!Tst_bits( val, (n) - 1     )   )
00699 
00707 #define Get_align( val, n     ) (  Rd_bits( val, (n) - 1     )   )

00717 #define Set_align(lval, n, alg) (  Wr_bits(lval, (n) - 1, alg)   )
00718 
00726 #define Align_up(  val, n     ) (((val) + ((n) - 1)) & ~((n) - 1))
00727 
00735 #define Align_down(val, n     ) ( (val)              & ~((n) - 1))

00761 #define Abs(a)              (((a) <  0 ) ? -(a) : (a))
00762 
00772 #define Min(a, b)           (((a) < (b)) ?  (a) : (b))
00773 
00783 #define Max(a, b)           (((a) > (b)) ?  (a) : (b))

00793 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00794   #define abs(a) \
00795   (\
00796     {\
00797       int __value = (a);\
00798       __asm__ ("abs\t%0" : "+r" (__value) :  : "cc");\
00799       __value;\
00800     }\
00801   )
00802 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00803   #define abs(a)      Abs(a)
00804 #endif

00815 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00816   #define min(a, b) \
00817   (\
00818     {\
00819       int __value, __arg_a = (a), __arg_b = (b);\
00820       __asm__ ("min\t%0, %1, %2" : "=r" (__value) : "r" (__arg_a), "r" (__arg_b));\
00821       __value;\
00822     }\
00823   )
00824 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00825   #define min(a, b)   __min(a, b)
00826 #endif

00837 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00838   #define max(a, b) \
00839   (\
00840     {\
00841       int __value, __arg_a = (a), __arg_b = (b);\
00842       __asm__ ("max\t%0, %1, %2" : "=r" (__value) : "r" (__arg_a), "r" (__arg_b));\
00843       __value;\
00844     }\
00845   )
00846 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00847   #define max(a, b)   __max(a, b)

00864 #define Long_call(addr)                   ((*(void (*)(void))(addr))())
00865 
00870 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00871   #define Reset_CPU() \
00872   (\
00873     {\
00874       __asm__ __volatile__ (\
00875         "lddpc   r9, 3f\n\t"\
00876         "mfsr    r8, %[SR]\n\t"\
00877         "bfextu  r8, r8, %[SR_M_OFFSET], %[SR_M_SIZE]\n\t"\
00878         "cp.w    r8, 0b001\n\t"\
00879         "breq    0f\n\t"\
00880         "sub     r8, pc, $ - 1f\n\t"\
00881         "pushm   r8-r9\n\t"\
00882         "rete\n"\
00883         "0:\n\t"\
00884         "mtsr    %[SR], r9\n"\
00885         "1:\n\t"\
00886         "mov     r0, 0\n\t"\
00887         "mov     r1, 0\n\t"\
00888         "mov     r2, 0\n\t"\
00889         "mov     r3, 0\n\t"\
00890         "mov     r4, 0\n\t"\
00891         "mov     r5, 0\n\t"\
00892         "mov     r6, 0\n\t"\
00893         "mov     r7, 0\n\t"\
00894         "mov     r8, 0\n\t"\
00895         "mov     r9, 0\n\t"\
00896         "mov     r10, 0\n\t"\
00897         "mov     r11, 0\n\t"\
00898         "mov     r12, 0\n\t"\
00899         "mov     sp, 0\n\t"\
00900         "stdsp   sp[0], sp\n\t"\
00901         "ldmts   sp, sp\n\t"\
00902         "mov     lr, 0\n\t"\
00903         "lddpc   pc, 2f\n\t"\
00904         ".balign 4\n"\
00905         "2:\n\t"\
00906         ".word   _start\n"\
00907         "3:\n\t"\
00908         ".word   %[RESET_SR]"\
00909         :\
00910         : [SR] "i" (AVR32_SR),\
00911           [SR_M_OFFSET] "i" (AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET),\
00912           [SR_M_SIZE] "i" (AVR32_SR_M_SIZE),\
00913           [RESET_SR] "i" (AVR32_SR_GM_MASK | AVR32_SR_EM_MASK | (AVR32_SR_M_SUP << AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET))\
00914       );\
00915     }\
00916   )
00917 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00918   #define Reset_CPU() \
00919   {\
00920     extern void *volatile __program_start;\
00921     __asm__ __volatile__ (\
00922       "mov     r7, LWRD(__program_start)\n\t"\
00923       "orh     r7, HWRD(__program_start)\n\t"\
00924       "mov     r9, LWRD("ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR_GM_MASK | AVR32_SR_EM_MASK | (AVR32_SR_M_SUP << AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET))")\n\t"\
00925       "orh     r9, HWRD("ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR_GM_MASK | AVR32_SR_EM_MASK | (AVR32_SR_M_SUP << AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET))")\n\t"\
00926       "mfsr    r8, "ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR)"\n\t"\
00927       "bfextu  r8, r8, "ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET)", "ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR_M_SIZE)"\n\t"\
00928       "cp.w    r8, 001b\n\t"\
00929       "breq    $ + 10\n\t"\
00930       "sub     r8, pc, -12\n\t"\
00931       "pushm   r8-r9\n\t"\
00932       "rete\n\t"\
00933       "mtsr    "ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR)", r9\n\t"\
00934       "mov     r0, 0\n\t"\
00935       "mov     r1, 0\n\t"\
00936       "mov     r2, 0\n\t"\
00937       "mov     r3, 0\n\t"\
00938       "mov     r4, 0\n\t"\
00939       "mov     r5, 0\n\t"\
00940       "mov     r6, 0\n\t"\
00941       "st.w    r0[4], r7\n\t"\
00942       "mov     r7, 0\n\t"\
00943       "mov     r8, 0\n\t"\
00944       "mov     r9, 0\n\t"\
00945       "mov     r10, 0\n\t"\
00946       "mov     r11, 0\n\t"\
00947       "mov     r12, 0\n\t"\
00948       "mov     sp, 0\n\t"\
00949       "stdsp   sp[0], sp\n\t"\
00950       "ldmts   sp, sp\n\t"\
00951       "mov     lr, 0\n\t"\
00952       "ld.w    pc, lr[4]"\
00953     );\
00954     __program_start;\
00955   }
00956 #endif

00968 #define Is_global_exception_enabled()         (!Tst_bits(Get_system_register(AVR32_SR), AVR32_SR_EM_MASK))

00972 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00973   #define Disable_global_exception()          ({__asm__ __volatile__ ("ssrf\t%0" :  : "i" (AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET));})
00974 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00975   #define Disable_global_exception()          (__set_status_flag(AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET))
00976 #endif

00980 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00981   #define Enable_global_exception()           ({__asm__ __volatile__ ("csrf\t%0" :  : "i" (AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET));})
00982 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00983   #define Enable_global_exception()           (__clear_status_flag(AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET))

01033 #define  MSB(u16)       (((U8  *)&(u16))[0]) //!< Most significant byte of \a u16.
01034 #define  LSB(u16)       (((U8  *)&(u16))[1]) //!< Least significant byte of \a u16.
01035         
01036 #define  MSH(u32)       (((U16 *)&(u32))[0]) //!< Most significant half-word of \a u32.
01037 #define  LSH(u32)       (((U16 *)&(u32))[1]) //!< Least significant half-word of \a u32.
01038 #define  MSB0W(u32)     (((U8  *)&(u32))[0]) //!< Most significant byte of 1st rank of \a u32.
01039 #define  MSB1W(u32)     (((U8  *)&(u32))[1]) //!< Most significant byte of 2nd rank of \a u32.
01040 #define  MSB2W(u32)     (((U8  *)&(u32))[2]) //!< Most significant byte of 3rd rank of \a u32.
01041 #define  MSB3W(u32)     (((U8  *)&(u32))[3]) //!< Most significant byte of 4th rank of \a u32.
01042 #define  LSB3W(u32)     MSB0W(u32)           //!< Least significant byte of 4th rank of \a u32.
01043 #define  LSB2W(u32)     MSB1W(u32)           //!< Least significant byte of 3rd rank of \a u32.
01044 #define  LSB1W(u32)     MSB2W(u32)           //!< Least significant byte of 2nd rank of \a u32.
01045 #define  LSB0W(u32)     MSB3W(u32)           //!< Least significant byte of 1st rank of \a u32.
01046         
01047 #define  MSW(u64)       (((U32 *)&(u64))[0]) //!< Most significant word of \a u64.
01048 #define  LSW(u64)       (((U32 *)&(u64))[1]) //!< Least significant word of \a u64.
01049 #define  MSH0(u64)      (((U16 *)&(u64))[0]) //!< Most significant half-word of 1st rank of \a u64.
01050 #define  MSH1(u64)      (((U16 *)&(u64))[1]) //!< Most significant half-word of 2nd rank of \a u64.
01051 #define  MSH2(u64)      (((U16 *)&(u64))[2]) //!< Most significant half-word of 3rd rank of \a u64.
01052 #define  MSH3(u64)      (((U16 *)&(u64))[3]) //!< Most significant half-word of 4th rank of \a u64.
01053 #define  LSH3(u64)      MSH0(u64)            //!< Least significant half-word of 4th rank of \a u64.
01054 #define  LSH2(u64)      MSH1(u64)            //!< Least significant half-word of 3rd rank of \a u64.
01055 #define  LSH1(u64)      MSH2(u64)            //!< Least significant half-word of 2nd rank of \a u64.
01056 #define  LSH0(u64)      MSH3(u64)            //!< Least significant half-word of 1st rank of \a u64.
01057 #define  MSB0D(u64)     (((U8  *)&(u64))[0]) //!< Most significant byte of 1st rank of \a u64.
01058 #define  MSB1D(u64)     (((U8  *)&(u64))[1]) //!< Most significant byte of 2nd rank of \a u64.
01059 #define  MSB2D(u64)     (((U8  *)&(u64))[2]) //!< Most significant byte of 3rd rank of \a u64.
01060 #define  MSB3D(u64)     (((U8  *)&(u64))[3]) //!< Most significant byte of 4th rank of \a u64.
01061 #define  MSB4D(u64)     (((U8  *)&(u64))[4]) //!< Most significant byte of 5th rank of \a u64.
01062 #define  MSB5D(u64)     (((U8  *)&(u64))[5]) //!< Most significant byte of 6th rank of \a u64.
01063 #define  MSB6D(u64)     (((U8  *)&(u64))[6]) //!< Most significant byte of 7th rank of \a u64.
01064 #define  MSB7D(u64)     (((U8  *)&(u64))[7]) //!< Most significant byte of 8th rank of \a u64.
01065 #define  LSB7D(u64)     MSB0D(u64)           //!< Least significant byte of 8th rank of \a u64.
01066 #define  LSB6D(u64)     MSB1D(u64)           //!< Least significant byte of 7th rank of \a u64.

01078 #define  CPU_TO_LE16(x) Swap16(x)

01081 #define  cpu_to_be16(x) (x)
01082 #define  BE16_TO_CPU(x) (x)
01083 #define  CPU_TO_BE16(x) (x)

01117 #define Swap16(u16) ((U16)(((U16)(u16) >> 8) |\
01118                            ((U16)(u16) << 8)))
01119 
01128 #define Swap32(u32) ((U32)(((U32)Swap16((U32)(u32) >> 16)) |\
01129                            ((U32)Swap16((U32)(u32)) << 16)))
01130 
01139 #define Swap64(u64) ((U64)(((U64)Swap32((U64)(u64) >> 32)) |\
01140                            ((U64)Swap32((U64)(u64)) << 32)))
01141 
01150 #if (defined __GNUC__)
01151 #  if (!defined __OPTIMIZE_SIZE__) || !__OPTIMIZE_SIZE__ 
01152   #define swap16(u16) ((U16)__builtin_bswap_16((U16)(u16)))
01153 #  else
01154   // swap_16 must be not used when GCC's -Os command option is used
01155   #define swap16(u16) Swap16(u16)
01156 #  endif
01157 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
01158   #define swap16(u16) ((U16)__swap_bytes_in_halfwords((U16)(u16)))
01159 #endif
01160 
01169 #if (defined __GNUC__)
01170   #define swap32(u32) ((U32)__builtin_bswap_32((U32)(u32)))
01171 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
01172   #define swap32(u32) ((U32)__swap_bytes((U32)(u32)))
01173 #endif
01174 
01183 #define swap64(u64) ((U64)(((U64)swap32((U64)(u64) >> 32)) |\
01184                            ((U64)swap32((U64)(u64)) << 32)))
